snippet.title: Sydney traffic: Truck rollover causes chaos on Eastern Distributor and Southern Cross Drive
snippet.content:
Drivers heading out of the city are in for an afternoon of heavy traffic after a truck rolled over on Southern Cross Drive. All southbound lanes were closed after the incident near Gardeners Road at 2.15pm but two have since reopened.Photo: livetraffic.com One lane remains closed and "heavy" traffic is backed up to the beginning of the Eastern Distributor, Transport for NSW said. Drivers have been advised to avoid the area if possible and expect "significant delays" of up to 30 minutes if heading south.
KENSINGTON: All lanes open on Eastern Distributor, lanes 2 & 3 southbound have re-opened on Southern Cross Dr with lane 1 still closed.
Buses in Randwick and Kensington are delayed up to 25 minutes. No one is believed to have been hurt. Police are investigating.
